content: पारिप्लव {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [परि-प्लु अच् स्वार्थे अण्] {@--1@} Moving to and fro, rolling, shaking, unsteady, tremulous; ननंद पारिप्लवनेत्रया नृपः <ls>R. 3. 11.</ls> {@--2@} Swimming, floating; <ls>R. 13. 30</ls>; <ls n="R.">16. 61.</ls> {@--3@} Agitated, bewildered, disturbed or perplexed; <ls>U. 4. 22.</ls> --वः A boat. --वं Restlessness, uneasiness, <ls>Māl. 4. 3.</ls>
